rules.name: myRule_8

Flow.description: Task: Update Due Date if Blank

value.stringValue: IF( ISBLANK([Task].Opportunity__r.Training_Call_Date__c), "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Take Training Call" )

formulas.name: formula_17_myRule_16_A1_2396304397
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Training_Call_Date__c}), "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Take Training Call" )

value.stringValue: CASE( [Task].Training_Call_Outcome__c , "No Show", "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Call Cancelled", "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Training Completed", "Rebuild Books", "CONTACT GREG" )

formulas.name: formula_20_myRule_19_A1_8467746797
formulas.expression: CASE( {!myVariable_current.Training_Call_Outcome__c} , "No Show", "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Call Cancelled", "Confirm Training Call Scheduled", "Training Completed", "Rebuild Books", "CONTACT GREG" )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject, "Setup Accounting Software"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status, "COMPLETED") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_16
formulas.expression: AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject}, "Setup Accounting Software"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, "COMPLETED") )

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Task].Training_Call_Outcome__c ,"Follow Up")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Task].Training_Call_Outcome__c ,"")), CONTAINS([Task].Subject ,"Take Training Call"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status ), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status ,"Completed") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_19
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Training_Call_Outcome__c} ,"Follow Up")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Training_Call_Outcome__c} ,"")), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject} ,"Take Training Call"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} ,"Completed") )

value.stringValue: AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject ,"Take Training Call"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status ), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status ,"Completed"), ISPICKVAL([Task].Training_Call_Outcome__c ,"Follow Up") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_22
formulas.expression: AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject} ,"Take Training Call"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} ,"Completed"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Training_Call_Outcome__c} ,"Follow Up") )

value.stringValue:
AND( CONTAINS([Task].Subject, "Offer BK Plan"), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status , "Completed"), ISCHANGED([Task].Status)
)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_29
formulas.expression:
AND( CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject}, "Offer BK Plan"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Completed"), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status})
)

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject ,"Client Moving New State | Review Plan") , NOT(ISBLANK([Task].Remediation_Status__c )) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_34
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status},"Completed"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject} ,"Client Moving New State | Review Plan") , NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Remediation_Status__c} )) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status ), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status ,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject ,"Authorize Extension"), ISPICKVAL([Task].Extension_Needed__c ,"Yes") )
